import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../../components/Product/Rating' import products from '../../products' import '../../index.css' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 ) } export default ProductScreen
